## Matrix4x4.scaleLeft() method

Pre-scale a Matrix4x4 by a vector.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static scaleLeft(m: Matrix4x4, s: Vector3, result?: Matrix4x4): Matrix4x4;
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description

m


</td><td>

[Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md)


</td><td>

The matrix that will be translated.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

s


</td><td>

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)


</td><td>

The scale vector.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

result


</td><td>

[Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The output matrix (can be the same as m), if not specified, a new matrix will be created.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md)

The output matrix

## Remarks

result = (scale matrix for s) \* m
